entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
